name: The Quiz (Borromeo)
description:
The Quiz is an short educational text-based interactive fiction RPG maker game created by Frederick C. Borromeo. Made with RPG Maker MV.

The bot wants to test the quizzes to finish.

(Note: The background of keyboard input has a little blurry behind the text image)

Features:

  • Based on Zork and Multiple Choice Trivia Quiz
  • This game is a RPG experience, also text-based game required to make the decision.
  • 10 minutes to play
  • Default Yes and No Choices
  • 6 endings and 20 quizzes (for Easy and Normal only) (including 10 original and 10 based on 'Multiple Choice Trivia Quiz')

Possible Features:

  • 5 endings and 15 quizzes (for Hard only)
  • 4 endings and 10 quizzes (for Very Hard only)
  • 4 Difficulties (Development)

UPDATES:

  • 8/10/19 - v1.0 - Full release
  • 8/11/19 - Uploaded Linux and MacOS Version
  • 8/11/19 - v1.1 - Remove face actor, Yanfly CoreEngine, and fix sound effects
  • September 2019 - Difficulty is added
